ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank Eleanor Pang and Zhisheng Her for assistance in the animal studies. We also thank Anis Larbi and the SIgN Flow Cytometry core for assistance with cytometry analyses, Esther Mok from the SIgN Immune Monitoring Group for support in the luminex assay and the SIgN Mouse Core for support in animal breeding. We thank Professor Andres Merits from the University of Tartu for providing the infectious clone of the tagged chikungunya virus used in this project. We also thank Insight Editing London for language editing the manuscript prior to submission. This research was funded by the Singapore Immunology Network (SIgN), Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) core grant and supported by the Biomedical Research Council (A*STAR). Yi-Hao Chan and Cheryl Y.P. Lee are supported by the A*STAR Graduate Scholarship. The funders had no role in the study design, data collection or analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
